PLDI starts in just a couple of weeks! Remember to register, and we’ll see you in Philadelphia. https://t.co/TGMp2cEz22

— PLDI (@PLDI) May 31, 2018

You can read all the PLDI 2018 papers now on @sigplan’s OpenTOC. https://t.co/UvgkLtQw4R

— PLDI (@PLDI) June 12, 2018

If you can’t make it to Philadelphia, you can still stream the main PLDI talks. https://t.co/kqqG6IahqL

— PLDI (@PLDI) June 18, 2018

Welcome to Philadelphia! Jeff Foster and Dan Grossman are kicking the 39th PLDI off right now. pic.twitter.com/aD8uvYqFUL

— PLDI (@PLDI) June 20, 2018

There are three Distinguished Paper awards this year. https://t.co/scQb7BGXDc https://t.co/uq0EOckzKs https://t.co/bogaQtlvUe

— PLDI (@PLDI) June 20, 2018

Keynote at #pldi18 by @headinthebox observing a duality between machine learning and database querying. pic.twitter.com/chcjKi7EPz

— Michael Hicks (@michael_w_hicks) June 21, 2018

Check out Margaret Martonosi's PLDI keynote entitled A “Post-ISA” Era in Computer Systems: Challenges and Opportunities tomorrow at 9am ET on the PLDI live stream: https://t.co/lQvu5ZuOSc pic.twitter.com/sgVenBRiqN

— Women in Comp Arch (@WICARCH) June 21, 2018

Congratulations to the winners of the PLDI Student Research Competition. pic.twitter.com/GMCiyjQqib

— PLDI (@PLDI) June 21, 2018

The PLDI Most Influential Paper award goes to Bondhugula et al.‘s 2008 polyhedral optimization paper. https://t.co/57JWLd14i4 pic.twitter.com/2xlF8mItAr

— PLDI (@PLDI) June 21, 2018

Ranjit Jhala has won the 2018 Robin Milner Young Researcher Award. pic.twitter.com/LQqOccjQet

— PLDI (@PLDI) June 21, 2018

Heterogeneity in the large and small @margmartonosi at PLDI #pldi2018 pic.twitter.com/LG0PijyBo1

The PLDI 2018 Distinguished Artifact Award goes to Justin Pombrio and @ShriramKMurthi for their paper on types for syntactic sugar. https://t.co/4T971FSiSU

— PLDI (@PLDI) July 9, 2018

Watch the talk videos from PLDI 2018. https://t.co/bMnX1bRnLs

— PLDI (@PLDI) July 17, 2018

Hey! You! Yea, you with the cool PL research! Submit a paper about your latest greatest PL research to PLDI 2019! https://t.co/N69vhKaUjc (Deadline: November 16, 2018)

— PLDI (@PLDI) October 10, 2018

It's happening! 9 days from now (Nov. 16, 2018) is the PLDI 2019 paper deadline. Assemble your favorite 12 pages of your best new PL research ideas, put them in a manuscript, and get that puppy submitted! https://t.co/bBTtyqyRNq

— PLDI (@PLDI) November 7, 2018

2015 SIGPLAN Programming Languages Software Award goes to Z3 https://t.co/rdLSaLr9ds #pldi15

Enjoyed @afd_icl's #pldi15 talk re OpenCL compiler bugs and his trick of demonstrating a CPU crasher to end the talk. No more slides!

Today's schedule http://t.co/cNnaTZ6kaB #pldi15

Alternatively, come see our work on Profile-Guided Meta-Programming in the BLUE room! @lambda_calculus @PLDI

Check out the top 10 abstract videos based on the daily voting in One Minute Madness https://t.co/7dQMGHFGxW #pldi15

PLDI 2016 Call for Contributions now available: http://t.co/C0MaB8dm7Z Submission deadline November 20

.@PLDI's Call for Contributions deadline is 11/20 & 11/13 for workshops & tutorials! http://t.co/B6n5AS20WW + http://t.co/as82fan1ka

The recommended LaTeX class file for PLDI'16 has been updated. Announcement: https://t.co/FwdVHI1WFB Download here: https://t.co/PmtT7wvjp7

@PLDI 2016, premier forum for research on programming language design & implementation: submit your best work here! pic.twitter.com/pkGoHKYcbH

Reminder: PLDI'16 submission deadline is 6pm Eastern time today. Good luck!

— PLDI (@PLDI) November 20, 2015

There were 303 submissions to PLDI'16, almost the same as the 304 to PLDI'15. Good luck to all the authors!

— PLDI (@PLDI) December 7, 2015

49 papers have been conditionally accepted to PLDI 2016. Congratulations to all authors! https://t.co/aj6ZUmzEYo

Please consider submitting to the PLDI 2016 Student Research Competition https://t.co/Pi6sLHOhV3 Deadline March 21. Spread the word!

PL Students: Great news! The @pldi student poster deadline has been extended to March 25th - Show off your research! https://t.co/LKBUAfWweo

@PLDI considering move to journal (PACM PL) that combines N conferences = no more PLDI proceedings. Respond here: https://t.co/RinR4PqgTV

Consider submitting to the PLDI'16 student poster session (distinct from student research competition) https://t.co/APAq00ys58 deadline 3/25

Deadline for SOAP wrksp @PLDI'16 extended to Mar 22. Waiting for your awesome program analysis ideas :-) https://t.co/IdLWTkVZn8

More student volunteers needed for PLDI'16! Volunteers get free registration! Details here: https://t.co/N6kYrJ0xm3 First deadline 4/7

PLDI'16 registration is open! Early reg. / hotel discounts end May 13. Registration: https://t.co/BGiWWZDAAK

Attend PLDI 2016. https://t.co/2bWXGCM27J @PLDI

Great talk this morning by @benzorn to kick off an exciting @PLDI conference. Glad the sun is out too! :)
